title: Banned in season 6
body: Do players that have been banned in season 6 at any time frame still get seasonal rewards? (I know season 5 rules does not apply, but pls)

replies.body:
No toxic players go in the BIN!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=trolledallmylife,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=aw2TQuvK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-23T15:35:22.199+0000)
>
> No toxic players go in the BIN!
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

No, toxic players go in the BIN! 
*or*  
No. Toxic players go in the BIN!

FTFY, because punctuation and making sense... 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

No one knows what the Season 6 rules will be. It changes most years.

Under the Season 5 rules you would be eligible for ranked rewards, but under the Season 4 rules you would not. The best thing to do is be as positive as you can until the Season 6 rules are released later this year.
